content.raw: Hmm, a thought I've just had (I was reviewing the code for this anyway because I'm finishing off that thesis section) is that maybe we should keep the requirement of the `WaitMonitor` in labscript, but make everything beyond the 3rd argument optional. This keeps the output that goes high/low during a wait, which is often used to arm the hardware device doing the retriggering. The lack of specifying devices/channels for arguments 4/5/6/7 in the labscript `WaitMonitor` would mean no wait monitor is used in BLACS.
